meanings.definition: Situated in or toward the interior of a country.
meanings.sent1: The small town was located inland, away from the bustling city.
meanings.sent2: People prefer the calm of inland areas over the busy coastal regions.
meanings.sent3: The inland village had a surprising number of unique traditions.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts drifted inland, away from the distractions of the coast.
meanings.sent5: The inland landscape was painted with vibrant colors of nature.

meanings.definition: Toward or into the interior of a country.
meanings.sent1: They traveled inland to explore the hidden gems of the countryside.
meanings.sent2: The river flows inland, away from the coastal regions.
meanings.sent3: The treasure map led them inland to a mysterious cave.
meanings.sent4: His dreams took him inland to a land of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The road winds inland, revealing breathtaking views along the way.
